message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I believe this is a fair price, but I'm open to discussing it further.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  To be fair to both of us, I could let it go for $18,000. This is a significant price reduction, reflecting my willingness to make a deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to pay more than $12,000. I hope we can find a middle ground that respects both our positions.
